text: Reminder: Friendly reminder - <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Ideas/ct-p/ideas|submit your ideas to the idea forum> and post the link here with your idea. The votes for a feature help HubSpotters understand the demand. Thank you for all of your awesome ideas and feedback, we are listening and appreciate it.

any road map for something along the lines of 'Field Display Type'? something which has been a challenge when integrating with other systems they have fields which become sensitive at some point in a process flow e.g. addresses once a company has been approved/verified by a finance team switching to display only (not editable).
